page.title: 01Gazeteer
page.content: Our area in Oldham isn't really the sort of place you'd go for a holiday. There are many people living here. Most of them aren't very rich or very poor, just average. Looking over our area there are many cotton mills with chimneys, rows of terraced houses, and a few green spaces in between. About half of the houses are council houses, and the other half are private houses. In this area there are plenty of shops, but they are mostly small shops. There are a few supermarkets though. There are lots of places for sports and parks for playing in. There are lots of different places of worship for mainly Christian and Muslim religions. At the edge of the block there are 'A' roads that lead straight to the M62 motorway which means that we are able to get to other places much quicker and easier.
